org.kiji.schema.impl.hbase
Class HBaseKijiBufferedWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.impl.hbase.HBaseKijiBufferedWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, KijiBufferedWriter, KijiDeleter, KijiPutter
@ApiAudience.Private
public final class HBaseKijiBufferedWriter
extends Object
implements KijiBufferedWriter

HBase implementation of a batch KijiTableWriter. Contains its own HTable connection to optimize performance. Buffer is stored locally and the underlying HTableInterface buffer is ignored. Default buffer size is 2,097,152 bytes.

Access to this Writer is threadsafe. All internal state mutations must synchronize against mInternalLock.

Constructor Summary
HBaseKijiBufferedWriter(HBaseKijiTable table)
          Creates a buffered kiji table writer that stores modifications to be sent on command or when the buffer overflows.
